name: Enrich businesses in Google Sheets using Yelp
description: Make will watch for new records in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals, search businesses containing in records by phone, and update a record in a spreadsheet using information found. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AhInGIAHEnLH95k2E6SG8s6pfOCJ5Y5aePEyA2WHknw/edit?usp=sharing).
